ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Manak,Ernie Chan,Joe Kubert,Ruben Yandoc,Tom Sutton,Tom Sutton,Ernie Chan,Rubeny,Dave Manak
ComicInfo.Summary: Andrew Bennett relates the story of his vampire curse, and how his beloved Mary became Mary, Queen of Blood. He and his present-day allies, Deborah Dancer and Dmitri Mishkin, are attacked by the vampires of Mary's organization, the Cult of the Blood Red Moon.
ComicInfo.Tags: The Blood Red Moon,Dmitri Mishkin,Queen Elizabeth I,Andrew Bennett,New York State,The House of Mystery,Deborah Dancer,Abel,Cain,Queen of Blood,Mary,Vampires,New York City
ComicInfo.Title: I... Vampire!; An Exercise in Fear; Special Defects
